aboutme.title: Who I am
aboutme.text-one: Hello, my name is Marcel, and I'm a German-speaking frontend developer from Steinfeld (Oldenburg). Inspired by the limitless possibilities of IT, I am passionate about creating visually appealing and intuitive website.
aboutme.text-two: I am versatile and perform effectively both on-site in Steinfeld ( Oldenburg ) and remotely. My adaptability enables me to seamlessly integrate into teams or work independently on projects, always maintaining clear communication and a structured approach to my work.
aboutme.text-three: I am receptive to new ideas and consistently strive for personal development. Always seeking exciting challenges, I view each task as an opportunity to elevate my knowledge and skills to the next level.
aboutme.text-four: For me, programming goes beyond just writing codeâ€”it's a creative approach to solving problems. I take pride in simplifying complex technical challenges into intuitive, user-friendly solutions. This is how I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skills.title: Technologies
skills.text-skillset: As part of my training in the front and backend fields, I have worked on various projects, utilizing a wide range of technologies and concepts. I am open to new approaches to continuously expand my skills and stay up to date in the ever-evolving world of web development.
skills.second-title: Do you need an additional skill?
skills.second-text: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge and gaining new experiences.
skills.mindset: I have a  special interest in learning
